languages.text: Из всей группы высадки живыми с планеты вернулись лишь четверо бойцов. Раззадоренные битвой ксеносы не были готовы умирать — жаждущие услышать перед смертью как можно больше предсмертных криков жертв, они с азартом впустили в свое сражение прибывших мон-кай.

traits.locale_text: Из всей группы высадки живыми с планеты вернулись лишь четверо бойцов. Раззадоренные битвой ксеносы не были готовы умирать — жаждущие услышать перед смертью как можно больше предсмертных криков жертв, они с азартом впустили в свое сражение прибывших мон-кай.

languages.text: Of the group that was sent to the planet's surface, only four warriors returned. Gripped by the frenzy of battle, the xenos were not ready to die — hungering to hear as many death cries as possible before going down, they eagerly let the newly-arrived mon-keigh join the fighting.
languages.original_text: Из всей группы высадки живыми с планеты вернулись лишь четверо бойцов. Раззадоренные битвой ксеносы не были готовы умирать — жаждущие услышать перед смертью как можно больше предсмертных криков жертв, они с азартом впустили в свое сражение прибывших мон-кай.

traits.locale_text: Of the group that was sent to the planet's surface, only four warriors returned. Gripped by the frenzy of battle, the xenos were not ready to die — hungering to hear as many death cries as possible before going down, they eagerly let the newly-arrived mon-keigh join the fighting.

Of the group that was sent to the planet's surface, only four warriors returned. Gripped by the frenzy of battle, the xenos were not ready to die — hungering to hear as many death cries as possible before going down, they eagerly let the newly-arrived mon-keigh join the fighting.

Of the group that was sent to the planet's surface, only four warriors returned. Gripped by the frenzy of battle, the xenos were not ready to die — hungering to hear as many death cries as possible before going down, they eagerly let the newly-arrived mon-keigh join the fighting.

Of the group that was sent to the planet's surface, only four warriors returned. Gripped by the frenzy of battle, the xenos were not ready to die — hungering to hear as many death cries as possible before going down, they eagerly let the newly-arrived mon-keigh join the fighting.

Of the group that was sent to the planet's surface, only four warriors returned. Gripped by the frenzy of battle, the xenos were not ready to die — hungering to hear as many death cries as possible before going down, they eagerly let the newly-arrived mon-keigh join the fighting.

languages.text: 所有被派到行星表面的那群人里，只有四名战士活着回来了。那群陷入战斗狂热的异形并不打算轻易咽气，他们渴望在倒下之前，尽可能地听到别人死亡的哀嚎，急切地邀请新来的猴子加入战斗。
languages.original_text: Of the group that was sent to the planet's surface, only four warriors returned. Gripped by the frenzy of battle, the xenos were not ready to die — hungering to hear as many death cries as possible before going down, they eagerly let the newly-arrived mon-keigh join the fighting.

traits.locale_text: 所有被派到行星表面的那群人里，只有四名战士活着回来了。那群陷入战斗狂热的异形并不打算轻易咽气，他们渴望在倒下之前，尽可能地听到别人死亡的哀嚎，急切地邀请新来的猴子加入战斗。

languages.text: 惑星表面に派遣されたグループのうち、帰還した戦士はわずか4名だった。戦いの熱狂に支配された異種族たちは、死ぬつもりなどまるでない。倒れる前にできるだけ多くの断末魔の叫びを聞きたいと切望していた彼らは、新しく到着したモン＝ケイを次々と戦闘に引きずり込んだ。
languages.original_text: Of the group that was sent to the planet's surface, only four warriors returned. Gripped by the frenzy of battle, the xenos were not ready to die — hungering to hear as many death cries as possible before going down, they eagerly let the newly-arrived mon-keigh join the fighting.

traits.locale_text: 惑星表面に派遣されたグループのうち、帰還した戦士はわずか4名だった。戦いの熱狂に支配された異種族たちは、死ぬつもりなどまるでない。倒れる前にできるだけ多くの断末魔の叫びを聞きたいと切望していた彼らは、新しく到着したモン＝ケイを次々と戦闘に引きずり込んだ。

languages.text: Del grupo que fue enviado a la superficie del planeta, solo regresaron cuatro guerreros. Presas del frenesí de la batalla, los xenos no estaban dispuestos a morir. Ansiosos por oír el mayor número posible de gritos de muerte antes de caer, dejaron que los mon-keigh recién llegados se unieran a la lucha.
languages.original_text: Of the group that was sent to the planet's surface, only four warriors returned. Gripped by the frenzy of battle, the xenos were not ready to die — hungering to hear as many death cries as possible before going down, they eagerly let the newly-arrived mon-keigh join the fighting.

traits.locale_text: Del grupo que fue enviado a la superficie del planeta, solo regresaron cuatro guerreros. Presas del frenesí de la batalla, los xenos no estaban dispuestos a morir. Ansiosos por oír el mayor número posible de gritos de muerte antes de caer, dejaron que los mon-keigh recién llegados se unieran a la lucha.

languages.text: Von der Gruppe, die auf die Oberfläche des Planeten geschickt wurde, kehrten nur vier Krieger zurück. Der Kampfrausch hatte die Xenos ergriffen, und sie waren nicht bereit zu sterben. Sie hungerten danach, möglichst viele Todesschreie zu hören, ehe sie selbst fielen. So gestatteten sie dem neu eingetroffenen Chem-Pan-Sey, sich an dem Kampf zu beteiligen.
languages.original_text: Of the group that was sent to the planet's surface, only four warriors returned. Gripped by the frenzy of battle, the xenos were not ready to die — hungering to hear as many death cries as possible before going down, they eagerly let the newly-arrived mon-keigh join the fighting.

traits.locale_text: Von der Gruppe, die auf die Oberfläche des Planeten geschickt wurde, kehrten nur vier Krieger zurück. Der Kampfrausch hatte die Xenos ergriffen, und sie waren nicht bereit zu sterben. Sie hungerten danach, möglichst viele Todesschreie zu hören, ehe sie selbst fielen. So gestatteten sie dem neu eingetroffenen Chem-Pan-Sey, sich an dem Kampf zu beteiligen.

languages.text: De tout le groupe envoyé à la surface de la planète, seuls quatre guerriers en ont réchappé. Ivres de sang, les xénos n'étaient pas prêts à mourir sans s'être d'abord repus des cris d'agonie de leurs victimes, et c'est bien volontiers qu'ils ont laissé les nouveaux venus mon-keigh prendre part au combat.
languages.original_text: Of the group that was sent to the planet's surface, only four warriors returned. Gripped by the frenzy of battle, the xenos were not ready to die — hungering to hear as many death cries as possible before going down, they eagerly let the newly-arrived mon-keigh join the fighting.

traits.locale_text: De tout le groupe envoyé à la surface de la planète, seuls quatre guerriers en ont réchappé. Ivres de sang, les xénos n'étaient pas prêts à mourir sans s'être d'abord repus des cris d'agonie de leurs victimes, et c'est bien volontiers qu'ils ont laissé les nouveaux venus mon-keigh prendre part au combat.
